job.title: Junior Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) - Remote
job.description: Ready to write the best chapter of your career? XSELL Technologies leverages artificial intelligence as a foundational capability to listen, learn and support agents in real-time with the exact information they need to exceed customers’ expectations and deliver top performer experiences.  Join us on our mission to empower agents, clients, and organizations to increase human performance and job satisfaction through making conversations more personal. We do this by pairing together the best elements of human touch and machine intelligence to drive results.  XSELL is currently seeking a Junior Site Reliability Engineer to build, maintain, and improve XSELL’s cloud-based application platform. This role combines systems engineering with web application development to tackle new and existing deployments, incidents, and continuous improvement of XSELL’s software platform with operational standards and principles. You will work closely with experienced web developers and site reliability engineers with a DevOps mentality and focus.  The ideal candidate has a solid foundational understanding of relevant cloud infrastructure and web application technologies and is looking for wide exposure to real-world challenges inside a fast-growing company. You should bring an open mindset and willingness to learn, and a passion for technology. We will train you to become an amazing, well-rounded technologist with relevant experience that exemplifies the DevOps mindset.  What You Will Bring  The problems you will tackle will benefit from the following... Ways You Will Contribute The Operations team is responsible for new client implementations, expansions, and incident handling of XSELL’s cloud-based software platform, as well as building out operational capabilities, including  You’ll be joining our growing Operations team, which is comprised of web application developers and traditional Site Reliability Engineers. What To Expect In Your First 30 Days XSELL is committed to a culture of teamwork; where everyone works together to plan, do, learn, and continuously improve. We accomplish that by staying true to our core values.
